info.game_comments: (Sofia: Hi, this is Sofia of the Clue Crew.  Today, you get Jeopardy! and the world-famous San Diego Zoo.  That's a lot of entertainment.)

WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE MY ETCHINGS?
